pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal Under-Five Mortality Methods for Estimation // Provides methods for estimating, projecting, and plotting spatio-temporal under-five mortality rates, described in Mercer et al. (2015) doi:10.1214/15-AOAS872 and Li et al. (2019) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0210645.
